docs.snippet: Joseph W. Wear of Philadelphia will captain the American Davis Cup tennis forces in Europe this year, if the United States succeeds in winning the American zone matches, which are to begin at Mexico City this week-end.
docs.lead_paragraph: Joseph W. Wear of Philadelphia will captain the American Davis Cup tennis forces in Europe this year, if the United States succeeds in winning the American zone matches, which are to begin at Mexico City this week-end.
docs.abstract: J W Wear to capt Amer team if U S wins North Amer Zone matches; plans

headline.main: Wear Selected to Lead U.S. Team In Davis Cup Competition Abroad; Philadelphian Chosen by U.S.L.T.A. as Preparations Are Made for Trophy Quest -- Trip Overseas Depends Upon Victory in Mexico Garland to Direct Training.

docs.snippet: In October of 1933 the Secretary of State, the Secretary of the Treasury and the chairman of the Federal Trade Commission invited a number of prominent men from different parts of the country to Washington to discuss the organization of a committee...
docs.lead_paragraph: In October of 1933 the Secretary of State, the Secretary of the Treasury and the chairman of the Federal Trade Commission invited a number of prominent men from different parts of the country to Washington to discuss the organization of a committee for the protection of American holders of foreign bonds.

docs.snippet: The foreign exchange market was quiet last week. Some strength was noted in the gold bloc on the first two days, but this was attributed to "shorts" covering month-end commitments. With the advent of the new month the demand from this quarter ceased,...
docs.lead_paragraph: The foreign exchange market was quiet last week. Some strength was noted in the gold bloc on the first two days, but this was attributed to "shorts" covering month-end commitments. With the advent of the new month the demand from this quarter ceased, the trend was reversed and the group developed a uniform trend downward to the week's close.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; WEEK ENDED May 4, 1935.

docs.snippet: BUENOS AIRES, May 8. -- Plans for a preliminary peace conference at Rio de Janeiro have been definitely dropped. Diplomatic representatives of the mediating republics will meet here tomorrow to arrange for the organization of a definite peace...
docs.lead_paragraph: BUENOS AIRES, May 8. -- Plans for a preliminary peace conference at Rio de Janeiro have been definitely dropped. Diplomatic representatives of the mediating republics will meet here tomorrow to arrange for the organization of a definite peace conference as proposed by the League of Nations.
docs.abstract: Calls preliminary organization meeting of Chaco mediators at Buenos Aires

headline.main: CHACO MEDIATORS TO ORGANIZE TODAY; Will Meet in Buenos Aires to Arrange for Peace Parley Proposed by League.

byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: World "trouble spots," from the standpoint of remittances for merchandise shipped, were lised as Argentina, Brazil, Germany, Rumania, Italy, Costa Rica, Spain, Nicaragua and Uruguay, at the monthly round-table conference on credit and collection...
docs.lead_paragraph: World "trouble spots," from the standpoint of remittances for merchandise shipped, were lised as Argentina, Brazil, Germany, Rumania, Italy, Costa Rica, Spain, Nicaragua and Uruguay, at the monthly round-table conference on credit and collection conditions abroad, sponsored at the Hotel Pennsylvania yesterday by the foreign credit interchange bureau of the National Association of Credit Men.
